name: TC
short: Turnip Calculator notifications for Animal Crossing
description: Schedule customizable notifications for Animal Crossing turnip market events. Includes Sunday pre-shop restock reminders and Wednesday sell recommendations with full timezone support.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores guild-specific configuration including channel IDs, role IDs, notification schedules, and custom messages.
install_msg: Thank you for installing TC! Use `[p]tc channel` to set up your notification channel, then `[p]tc enable` to start receiving turnip notifications.
author: asdas-cogs
